name: Baby Guardians
description:
Have you ever felt that life just wasn't giving you much joy anymore? Ever find yourself screaming about anime characters at 3 in the morning? Well this is the game for you! A game about getting back out into the real world and experiencing joy with others again with the help of your new Baby Guardian.

While working out, feeding them and being social, you will meet new and interesting people who are also Guardian owners. Go out and live your best life! You only have the one.
